mapper.update: update PBCRS_REPORT_GUARACCTBSSGMT set INFRECTYPE = #{InfRecType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCTTYPE = #{AcctType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCTCODE = #{AcctCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RPTDATE = #{RptDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RPTDATECODE = #{RptDateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDTYPE = #{IDType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDNUM = #{IDNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MNGMTORGCODE = #{MngmtOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORTFLAG = #{reportflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where GUARACCTBSSGMTSEQNO = #{GuarAcctBsSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select GUARACCTBSSGMTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, ACCTTYPE, ACCTCODE, RPTDATE, RPTDATECODE, NAME, IDTYPE, IDNUM, MNGMTORGCODE, REPORTFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_GUARACCTBSSGMT where GUARACCTBSSGMTSEQNO = #{GuarAcctBsSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select GUARACCTBSSGMTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, ACCTTYPE, ACCTCODE, RPTDATE, RPTDATECODE, NAME, IDTYPE, IDNUM, MNGMTORGCODE, REPORTFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_GUARACCTBSSGMT
select count(1) from pbcrs_report_GuarAcctBsSgmt info1 left join pbcrs_report_GuarAcctBsInfSgmt info2 on info1.guaracctbssgmtseqno=info2.GuarAcctBsInfSgmtSeqNo where 1=1
